articles.content: Two longer-term, walk-in community COVID-19 vaccination sites will open Monday in Milwaukee. The sites are for residents of 10 ZIP codes that rank high in terms of vulnerability to disasters such as … [+4322 chars]

articles.author: Frank Jordans, Associated Press
articles.title: Scientist behind coronavirus shot says next target is cancer - KSL.com
articles.description: The scientist who won the race to deliver the first widely used coronavirus vaccine says people can rest assured the shots are safe, and the technology behind it will soon be used to fight another global scourge — cancer.

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccines causing worry - Chicago Daily Herald
articles.description: What side effects can I expect from the COVID-19 vaccine? There are so many stories floating around that knowing what to believe is hard.
